data.actual_result: It says that the account is unclaimed.
data.expected_result: The app shows the user information normally and doesn't show that the account is unclaimed.
data.short_description: Changing the language of Discord on another device causes it the desktop app to think that the account is unclaimed.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings on Desktop - On another device (in this case iOS) change your Discord language
